list.name: HIEROGLYPH-HALT
list.description: Finx reduces the reload speed of any enemy Brawlers hit by his main attack by x% for x seconds.
list.descriptionHtml: Finx reduces the reload speed of any enemy Brawlers hit by his main attack by x% for x seconds.

list.name: PRIMER
list.description: Damage dealt only from Finx's projectiles that are sped up by Time Warp, will increase the Super duration by x seconds each.
list.descriptionHtml: Damage dealt only from Finx's projectiles that are sped up by Time Warp, will increase the Super duration by x seconds each.
